name: Easy Maryland Crab Cakes
author: shelleyannsham
summary: Delicious and easy fried crab cakes with little filler and a ton of crab flavor.
ingredients: 1 pound cooked crab claw meat, drained
1 ½ teaspoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)
⅓ cup vegetable oil for frying
directions: Mix crab, crushed crackers, egg, mayonnaise, Worcestershire sauce, parsley, seafood seasoning, mustard, lemon zest, and pepper in a large bowl until well combined
Shape into 6 cakes and place in the refrigerator until firm, about 30 minutes
Pour 1/8 inch vegetable oil into a large iron skillet or frying pan
Remove cakes from the refrigerator and fry in the hot oil until golden brown, 4 to 5 minutes per side
